com.github.valid8j.pcond.core.fluent

Interface AbstractObjectChecker<V extends Checker<V,T,R>,T,R>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Checker<V,T,R>, Matcher<V,T,R>, Statement<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BooleanChecker<T>, ComparableNumberChecker<V,T,N>, DoubleChecker<T>, FloatChecker<T>, IntegerChecker<OIN>, ListChecker<T,E>, LongChecker<OIN>, ObjectChecker<OIN,E>, ShortChecker<T>, StreamChecker<T,E>, StringChecker<T>, ThrowableChecker<T,E>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BooleanChecker.Impl, DoubleChecker.Impl, FloatChecker.Impl, IntegerChecker.Impl, ListChecker.Impl, LongChecker.Impl, ObjectChecker.Impl, ShortChecker.Impl, StreamChecker.Impl, StringChecker.Impl, ThrowableChecker.Impl

    public interface AbstractObjectChecker<V extends Checker<V,T,R>,T,R>
extends Checker<V,T,R>

    An interface that defines to check a target object.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.github.valid8j.pcond.core.fluent.Checker

        Checker.Base<V extends Checker<V,T,R>,T,R>

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.github.valid8j.pcond.core.fluent.Matcher

        Matcher.JunctionType

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default V equalTo(Object anotherObject)
      Adds a predicate to this checker object to check the target object with the argument for anotherObject if they are "equal", using equalTo method.
      default V instanceOf(Class<?> klass)
      Adds a predicate to this checker object to check if the target object is an instance of Class klass.
      default V invoke(String methodName, Object... args)
      Adds a predicate to this checker object to check if the target object returns true if a method specified by methodName and args is invoked.
      default V invokeStatic(Class<?> klass, String methodName, Object... args)
      Checks if a static method specified by klass, methodName, and args.
      default V notNull()
      Adds a predicate to this checker object to check if the target object is NOT null.
      default V nullValue()
      Adds a predicate to this checker object to check if the target object IS null.
      default V sameReferenceAs(Object anotherObject)
      Adds a predicate to this checker object to check the target object and the argument for anotherObject if they are referencing the same object.

    • Method Detail

      • notNull

        default V notNull()

        Adds a predicate to this checker object to check if the target object is NOT null.

        Returns:
        The updated checker object.

      • nullValue

        default V nullValue()

        Adds a predicate to this checker object to check if the target object IS null.

        Returns:
        The updated checker object.

      • equalTo

        default V equalTo(Object anotherObject)

        Adds a predicate to this checker object to check the target object with the argument for anotherObject if they are "equal", using equalTo method.

        Parameters:
        anotherObject - An object with which the target object of this checker should be checked.
        Returns:
        The updated checker object.

      • sameReferenceAs

        default V sameReferenceAs(Object anotherObject)

        Adds a predicate to this checker object to check the target object and the argument for anotherObject if they are referencing the same object.

        Parameters:
        anotherObject - An object with which the target object of this checker should be checked.
        Returns:
        The updated checker object.

      • instanceOf

        default V instanceOf(Class<?> klass)

        Adds a predicate to this checker object to check if the target object is an instance of Class klass.

        Parameters:
        klass - A class to check if the target object is an instance of.
        Returns:
        The updated checker object.

      • invoke

        default V invoke(String methodName,
                 Object... args)

        Adds a predicate to this checker object to check if the target object returns true if a method specified by methodName and args is invoked. The method to be invoked is chosen by MethodQuery.instanceMethod(Object, String, Object[]).

        Parameters:
        methodName - A nme of method to be invoked.
        args - Arguments to be passed by the method.
        Returns:
        The updated object.
        See Also:
        MethodQuery.instanceMethod(Object, String, Object[])

      • invokeStatic

        default V invokeStatic(Class<?> klass,
                       String methodName,
                       Object... args)

        Checks if a static method specified by klass, methodName, and args. The method to be invoked is chosen by MethodQuery.classMethod(Class, String, Object[]). To specify the target object as an argument, you can use the value returned from Functions.parameter().

        Parameters:
        klass - A class to which the static method to be invoked belongs.
        methodName - The name of the method to be invoked.
        args - Arguments to be passed to the method to be invoked.
        See Also:
        MethodQuery.classMethod(Class, String, Object[])
